name: Dynacore
description:
NOTE: I am currently trying to get the web build to work on itch.io. In the meantime please download one of the standalone builds below. :) 1.0.2 - Fixed bug where guns with the "wavy" modifier would always shoot to the right 1.0.1 - Selling machines now give out less money the more items have been sold - Various Boss Battle related bug fixes 1.0.0 - Initial Release

Dynacore is a top-down roguelike shooter. Make your way through 4 hazard- and enemy-filled levels to find a way off the wreched planet you've been stranded on. Every death sends you back to the beginning so you'll have to use the Weapons, Trinkets and Traps you find on your way as well as your prior experiences in the depths to your advantage to make it out alive!

Game by Prox276

Promotional Artwork by Mochii

Assets Used

Awkward by Void | Thaleah by Tiny Worlds | Weiholmir by JustFredrik

This project has been my personal passion project for the past two years, so I hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it. :)

Special Thanks to the GDB and Newgrounds Communities
